executiveSummary: 19-year-old entrepreneur Tania Speaks from Baltimore, Maryland, presented her organic skincare brand 'Tania Speaks Organic Skincare' on Shark Tank, seeking $400,000 for 10% equity. After sharing her inspiring story of overcoming bullying and achieving $1.4 million in sales, Mark Cuban offered $400,000 for 15% equity, which Tania accepted.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $400,000 for 15% equity in Tania Speaks Organic Skincare.

actionItems.task: Conduct third-party accredited lab testing to validate product efficacy claims for brow growth.
Arrange a meeting between Tania Speaks and Mark Cubanâ€™s daughters, Alyssa and Alexis, as part of the investment contingencies.

nextSteps: Tania will collaborate with Mark Cuban to strengthen legal protection, conduct efficacy testing, and continue growing her skincare business with new mentorship and guidance.
